about_the_game:
Step into Challenges of the Cursed Island, where every second could be your last! In this high-stakes pirate survival game, players brave a cursed island, dodging relentless explosions and mystical traps. With cunning strategy and quick reflexes, chart your way through explosive challenges, amass treasure, and conquer progressively perilous levels.

As the chaos escalates, so too does the intensity. Push your limits and see how long you can endure the relentless onslaught. With each level unlocked, the stakes rise, offering a truly immersive and exhilarating experience.

Not content with the existing challenges? Unleash your inner game designer with the intuitive level editor. Craft your own arenas, tailor-made to test even the most seasoned players' skills.

Gather your crew and face the Cursed Island together! The game supports up to 4 players in co-op, letting friends dive into the explosive chaos side by side. Work as a team, strategize on the fly, and see if your crew has what it takes to survive the island’s relentless challenges!

Are You Ready to Brave the Curse?

Surviving isn’t the question—it's how long you can outlast the island’s wrath. Challenges of the Cursed Island combines strategy, skill, and nerves of steel for an unending thrill ride. Step into the chaos and prove you’re worthy of the pirate's path today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Survive the Cursed Island’s explosive challenges in this high-intensity multiplayer action game. Dodge relentless blasts, face trial after trial, or craft your own chaotic levels. Can you outlast the Curse and return home?
